channel.description: Recent content in Pivot on Personal Blog

item.title: [HTB] Machine: Carrier
item.description: Carrier Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.105 --min-rate 5000 Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-10-23 19:29 BST Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.105 (10.10.10.105) Host is up (0.10s latency). Not shown: 65450 filtered tcp ports (no-response), 83 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 26.37 seconds └─$ nmap -Pn -p22,80 -sC -sV 10.

item.title: [HTB] Machine: Vault
item.description: Vault Enumeration nmap └─$ nmap -Pn -p- 10.10.10.109 --min-rate 5000 Starting Nmap 7.94 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2023-10-23 19:19 BST Warning: 10.10.10.109 giving up on port because retransmission cap hit (10). Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.109 (10.10.10.109) Host is up (0.12s latency). Not shown: 56547 filtered tcp ports (no-response), 8986 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE 22/tcp open ssh 80/tcp open http Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 133.
